anya-e0105n22:1_0: Kasmā pana te taṁ āyāciṁsūti? Vuccate,
anya-e0105n22:1_1: mahāvihāravāsino hi āditoyeva paṭṭhāya piṭakattayaṁ yathā tīsu saṅgītīsu pāḷibhāsāya saṅgītaṁ,
anya-e0105n22:1_3: tathā porāṇaṁ pāḷipiṭakameva uggaṇhanti ceva vācenti ca,
anya-e0105n22:1_6: Tathā hi aṭṭhakathāsu vasabharājakālato (609-653-bu-0) pacchā sīhaḷikattherānañceva aññesañca vatthu na dissati ṭhapetvā mahāsenarājavatthuṁ pārā. aṭṭha.
anya-e0105n22:1_8: yāva ācariyabuddhaghosakālāpi ca tā eva porāṇaṭṭhakathāyo atthi na abhinavīkatā.
anya-e0105n22:1_9: Tena tesaṁ piṭakesu yebhuyyena janā paricayaṁ kātuṁ asañjātābhilāsā honti asañjātussāhā.
anya-e0105n22:1_10: Dīpantaresu ca attano piṭakaṁ pattharāpetuṁ na sakkonti aṭṭhakathānaṁ dīpabhāsāya abhisaṅkhatattā.
anya-e0105n22:1_11: Abhayagirivāsino pana vaṭṭagāmaṇirājakālato paṭṭhāya sakkatabhāsāropitaṁ dhammarucinikāyādipiṭakampi
anya-e0105n22:1_12: mahāyānapiṭakampi navaṁ navaṁ pariyāpuṇanti ceva vācenti ca,
anya-e0105n22:1_13: tena tesaṁ piṭakesu yebhuyyena janā paricayaṁ kātuṁ sañjātābhilāsā honti sañjātussāhā,
anya-e0105n22:1_15: Tatoyeva te dīpantaresupi attano vādaṁ pattharāpetuṁ sakkonti.
anya-e0105n22:1_16: Tasmā te mahāvihāravāsino therā attano sīhaḷaṭṭhakathāyo pāḷibhāsāya abhisaṅkharitukāmā tathā kātuṁ samatthaṁ
anya-e0105n22:1_17: ācariyabuddhaghosattherassa ñāṇappabhāvavisesaṁ yathāvuttaguṇasampannabhāvañca ñatvā āyāciṁsūti veditabbaṁ.
